XML Calabash Reference (Version 0.14)

Name

p:load — The standard p:load step.

Synopsis

<p:declare-step type="p:load">
     <p:output port="result"/>
     <p:option name="href" required="true"/>                       <!-- anyURI -->
     <p:option name="dtd-validate" select="'false'"/>              <!-- boolean -->
</p:declare-step>
